section.p: You can leave possessions and money here at your town house. Record anything you leave in the box below. Each time you return, to see what’s happened in your absence:

outcomes.outcome: Fire; the town house and its contents have been destroyed

section.p:
If your town house has burned down,
turn to 155
and erase the tick beside the town house option there.
Otherwise read on.
The town house is a good place to relax after your travels. If injured, restore your Stamina to its normal score. When you are ready to leave, .
